mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.board_id, r.content, r.likes_count, r.parent_id, r.reg_date, r.writer_id, b.title, b.category_name FROM reply r INNER JOIN board b ON r.board_id = b.id WHERE r.writer_id = #{memberId} AND b.is_deleted = false ORDER BY r.reg_date DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT b.id, b.title, b.reg_date, b.views, b.likes_count, b.category_name, b.reply_count FROM board b INNER JOIN likes l ON b.id = l.target_id WHERE l.type = "게시물" AND l.member_id = #{memberId} AND b.is_deleted = false ORDER BY b.reg_date DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
